name: Click-To-Call Sticky Mobile Button Lite
author: Sitelinx

sections.description:
This Click-To-Call plugin has been developed by highly skilled, SEO-oriented programmers. This plugin was developed especially for website owners who prioritize website speed, SEO and understand its impact on their Google search results rankings.

Uploading this sticky Click-To-Call plugin to your website will add a simple SEO friendly bar at the bottom of any mobile device while browsing your website, allowing the user to contact you fast and easily.

The two default communication means are phone and Email. Premium users can enjoy fast links to their: WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Google My Business, Skype, Telegram, Onlyfans and Linktr.ee.

Available languages: English (US), Hebrew

About Us:
We are a team of SEO and coding specialists with over 15 years of experience, servicing clients from all over the globe. We build super lightweight SEO oriented digital products that help boost conversion rate.

Our services include:
WordPress Website Development
Template Design (HTML, CSS, JS)
WordPress and Elementor Website Development
Server Administration
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Google Business Profile Optimization, Full Management and SEO
Google & Facebook PPC

Available languages: English (US), Hebrew

Plugin Features

Quick and easy sticky to bottom Click-To-Call plugin visible in mobile devices only.

WordPress Click-To-Call made super easy!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/click-to-call-sticky-mobile-button-lite directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to setting menu in backend and click on Click TO Call Setting.
  4. Add all social links and select the icons position to view in mobile.
sections.faq:
What languages are available?

English (US)

Can I choose different icons?

The plugin comes with a default icon.
